title: Sonterra Apartments
posting_body: ['Sonterra Apartments', '5050 Tamarus Street, Las Vegas, NV 89119', 'Spacious 2BR/1BA Apartment - 816 sqft', 'Monthly Rent $1250.00', 'This rental fee includes Utilities such as Water, Sewer and Trash.', '*Please note, Electricity with Nevada Energy is not included in the rental fee listed above.', 'Rental Criteria:', 'No Evictions or Rental Collections', 'No Misdemeanors or Felonies', 'No Child support collections exceeding $20,000.00', 'Proof of Steady Monthly Income - Must add up to DOUBLE the Rent Amount', 'Ready to apply?', 'Heres what you should bring:', 'Driver License/ Identification Card (current & Government-issued)', 'Proof of Social Security Number or ITIN', 'Contact information for prior landlords', '2-4 Recent Pay stubs/ Verifiable Proof of Income', 'The rental application can be located at <URL>', '*$55.00 Nonrefundable Application Fee required for each applicant over 18 years old.', 'Upon approval, Approved applicants have 48 hours max to submit Holding Fee payment of $250.00.', 'Please keep in mind, this holding fee can hold the unit for no longer than 2 weeks max.', 'Approved applicants must complete the move in process within 2 weeks from the date of application approval.', '*This $250.00 Holding fee will also be deducted from the security deposit amount upon move in.', 'Security Deposit upon approval is as followed:', '$500.00', '$750.00', '$1000.00', '-The security deposit amount varies based upon verifiable information submitted with the rental application.', 'Once the application is submitted, please allow up to 5 days max before expecting a status update regarding application status.', 'Westland Real Estate Group is a family-owned company that features 30 multi-family communities throughout Las Vegas.', 'With over 10,000 units in the area, we offer everything from studios to three-bedroom townhomes, with a variety of in-demand amenities.', 'Enjoy stress-free living in our well-maintained communities with clean grounds and professional staff.', 'At Westland, you’ve found a place where you can invest in your future']
